name: Auto-eligible - typo fix in docstring
description: Simple typo fix in documentation should be auto-fix eligible with high score

input.title: Typo in add.py: 'teh' should be 'the'
input.body:
## Description
In `src/add.py`, there are typos in the docstring:

- Line 1: `"""Addition module for teh calculator."""` should be `"""Addition module for the calculator."""`
- Line 8: `Teh first number` should be `The first number`

## Files Affected
- `src/add.py`

## Suggested Fix
Replace 'teh' with 'the' and 'Teh' with 'The'.
